name: HOUSE OF VINES
description:
CONTENT WARNING FOR BULLYING, TRANSPHOBIA, AND ABUSE. 

Following the story of a young man named Sage, you unravel the past that he pushed down into the darkest depths of his mind. Will you choose to seek healing, and find a way out of the house? Or will you give in to the dreadful thoughts of hopelessness?

Thank you so much for playing! We plan to add onto the game in the future, so keep an eye out for that!

CREDITS:

  • koolaidshark - Coding, script, artwork
  • soot_x - Artwork
  • limineonal - Coding, artwork
  • alkarab - Music
